snippet: Albert Woodfox, 68, the last of the “Angola Three” inmates, whose decades in solitary confinement drew international condemnation, on Monday was ordered released by a judge.
abstract: Federal Judge James Brady orders release of Albert Woodfox, who has spent decades in solitary confinement at Louisiana State Penitentiary in Angola; Woodfox is last of 'Angola Three' inmates, all of whom spent long periods of time in the prison in solitary confinement.
lead_paragraph: Albert Woodfox, 68, the last of the “Angola Three” inmates, whose decades in solitary confinement drew international condemnation, on Monday was ordered released by a judge.

headline.main: Louisiana: Man Held for Decades in Solitary Is Ordered Freed
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: Man Held for Decades in Solitary Is Ordered Freed
